00072 /*
00073  * Convert the file, the process is the same as the XDA process.
00074  */
00075 bool CELFileConvertToCalvin::ConvertASCIIFile(const char *fileName, const char *newFile, CELFileConversionOptions *options)
00076 {
00077         return ConvertXDAFile(fileName, newFile, options, NULL);
00078 }

00080 /*
00081  * Convert the file.
00082  */
00083 
00084 bool CELFileConvertToCalvin::ConvertXDAFile(const char *fileName, const char *newFile, CELFileConversionOptions *options, const char * datFileName)
00085 {
00086         Clear();
00087 
00088     // Set Options for use by member methods
00089     m_Options = options;
00090 
00091         // Read the input file.
00092         CCELFileData inFile;
00093         inFile.SetFileName(fileName);
00094         if (inFile.Read() == false)
00095         {
00096                 errorCode = UnableToOpenCelFile;
00097                 return false;
00098         }
00099 
00100         // Create the calvin data object.
00101         CelFileData data(newFile);
00102 
00103         // Add the parameters.
00104         CCELFileHeaderData &gcosHeader = inFile.GetHeader();
00105         int nparams = gcosHeader.GetNumberAlgorithmParameters();
00106         ParameterNameValueType param;
00107         for (int iparam=0; iparam<nparams; iparam++)
00108         {
00109                 string name = gcosHeader.GetAlgorithmParameterTag(iparam);
00110                 param.SetName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(name.c_str()));
00111                 param.SetValueAscii(gcosHeader.GetAlgorithmParameter(name.c_str()));
00112                 data.AddAlgorithmParameter(param);
00113         }
00114 
00115         // Add the grid to the parameters
00116         GridCoordinatesType grid = inFile.GetGridCorners();
00117         param.SetName(GRIDULX_PARAM_NAME);
00118         param.SetValueFloat((float)grid.upperleft.x);
00119         data.AddAlgorithmParameter(param);
00120 
00121         param.SetName(GRIDULY_PARAM_NAME);
00122         param.SetValueFloat((float)grid.upperleft.y);
00123         data.AddAlgorithmParameter(param);
00124 
00125         param.SetName(GRIDURX_PARAM_NAME);
00126         param.SetValueFloat((float)grid.upperright.x);
00127         data.AddAlgorithmParameter(param);
00128 
00129         param.SetName(GRIDURY_PARAM_NAME);
00130         param.SetValueFloat((float)grid.upperright.y);
00131         data.AddAlgorithmParameter(param);
00132 
00133         param.SetName(GRIDLRX_PARAM_NAME);
00134         param.SetValueFloat((float)grid.lowerright.x);
00135         data.AddAlgorithmParameter(param);
00136 
00137         param.SetName(GRIDLRY_PARAM_NAME);
00138         param.SetValueFloat((float)grid.lowerright.y);
00139         data.AddAlgorithmParameter(param);
00140 
00141         param.SetName(GRIDLLX_PARAM_NAME);
00142         param.SetValueFloat((float)grid.lowerleft.x);
00143         data.AddAlgorithmParameter(param);
00144 
00145         param.SetName(GRIDLLY_PARAM_NAME);
00146         param.SetValueFloat((float)grid.lowerleft.y);
00147         data.AddAlgorithmParameter(param);
00148 
00149 
00150         // Add the algorithm name, array type and dimensions.
00151         data.SetAlgorithmName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(gcosHeader.GetAlg()));
00152     if((m_Options != NULL)&&(m_Options->m_ChipType != NULL)) 
00153     {
00154             data.SetArrayType(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(m_Options->m_ChipType));
00155     }
00156     else
00157     {
00158             data.SetArrayType(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(gcosHeader.GetChipType()));
00159     }
00160         data.SetCols(gcosHeader.GetCols());
00161         data.SetRows(gcosHeader.GetRows());
00162         data.SetIntensityCount(gcosHeader.GetCells());
00163         data.SetStdDevCount(gcosHeader.GetCells());
00164         data.SetPixelCount(gcosHeader.GetCells());
00165         data.SetOutlierCount(gcosHeader.GetOutliers());
00166         data.SetMaskCount(gcosHeader.GetMasked());
00167 
00168         // Allow extra parameters to override parameters from the file.
00169         AddExtraParameters(data);
00170 
00171         // Add the parent header
00172         // from ConvertASCIIFile
00173         if ( datFileName == NULL )
00174         {
00175                 GenericDataHeader hdr;
00176                 if(!FillParentGenericDataHeader(hdr, inFile))
00177                 {
00178                         return false;
00179                 }
00180                 data.GetFileHeader()->GetGenericDataHdr()->AddParent(hdr);
00181 
00182         }
00183         else // datFileName is not null
00184         {
00185                 if (strlen(datFileName) == 0)
00186                 {
00187                         GenericDataHeader hdr;
00188                         if(!FillParentGenericDataHeader(hdr, inFile))
00189                         {
00190                                 return false;
00191                         }
00192 
00193                         // need to change it to multi-scan-acquisition
00194                         hdr.SetFileTypeId("affymetrix-calvin-multi-scan-acquisition");
00195                         data.GetFileHeader()->GetGenericDataHdr()->AddParent(hdr);
00196 
00197                 }
00198                 else
00199                 {
00200                         affymetrix_calvin_io::DATData* dat = new DATData;
00201 
00202                         // Read DAT header
00203                         DATFileReader reader;
00204                         reader.SetFilename(datFileName);
00205 
00206                         try
00207                         {
00208                                 reader.Read(*dat);
00209                         }
00210                         catch(affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::CalvinException&)
00211                         {
00212                 //              CloseDAT();
00213                 //              return false;
00214                         }
00215 
00216                         // cell file data
00217                         data.GetFileHeader()->GetGenericDataHdr()->AddParent(*dat->GetFileHeader()->GetGenericDataHdr());
00218                 }
00219         }
00220 
00221         // Create a writer.
00222         try
00223         {
00224                 CelFileWriter writer(data);
00225                 int ncells = gcosHeader.GetCells();
00226                 FloatVector intensities;
00227                 intensities.resize(ncells);
00228                 for (int icel=0; icel<ncells; icel++)
00229                 {
00230                         intensities[icel] = inFile.GetIntensity(icel);
00231                 }
00232                 writer.WriteIntensities(intensities);
00233                 intensities.clear();
00234 
00235                 FloatVector stdv;
00236                 stdv.resize(ncells);
00237                 for (int icel=0; icel<ncells; icel++)
00238                 {
00239                         stdv[icel] = inFile.GetStdv(icel);
00240                 }
00241                 writer.WriteStdDevs(stdv);
00242                 stdv.clear();
00243 
00244                 Int16Vector pix;
00245                 pix.resize(ncells);
00246                 for (int icel=0; icel<ncells; icel++)
00247                 {
00248                         pix[icel] = inFile.GetPixels(icel);
00249                 }
00250                 writer.WritePixels(pix);
00251                 pix.clear();
00252 
00253                 int ioutlier=0;
00254                 int noutliers = gcosHeader.GetOutliers();
00255                 XYCoordVector coords(noutliers);
00256                 for (int icel=0; icel<ncells; icel++)
00257                 {
00258                         if (inFile.IsOutlier(icel) == true)
00259                         {
00260                                 coords[ioutlier].xCoord = inFile.IndexToX(icel);
00261                                 coords[ioutlier].yCoord = inFile.IndexToY(icel);
00262                                 ++ioutlier;
00263                         }
00264                 }
00265                 writer.WriteOutlierCoords(coords);
00266                 coords.clear();
00267 
00268                 int imasked=0;
00269                 int nmasked = gcosHeader.GetMasked();
00270                 coords.resize(nmasked);
00271                 for (int icel=0; icel<ncells; icel++)
00272                 {
00273                         if (inFile.IsMasked(icel) == true)
00274                         {
00275                                 coords[imasked].xCoord = inFile.IndexToX(icel);
00276                                 coords[imasked].yCoord = inFile.IndexToY(icel);
00277                                 ++imasked;
00278                         }
00279                 }
00280                 writer.WriteMaskCoords(coords);
00281         }
00282         catch (...)
00283         {
00284                 errorCode = UnableToWriteTheFile;
00285                 return false;
00286         }
00287         return true;
00288 }

00290 /*
00291  * Fills the GenericDataHeader with either the GenericDataHeader from the parent
00292  * Command Console file or based on the GCOS CEL file.
00293  */
00294 bool CELFileConvertToCalvin::FillParentGenericDataHeader(GenericDataHeader& hdr, CCELFileData& inFile)
00295 {
00296         if (GetParentGenericDataHeader(hdr) == false)
00297         {
00298                 return GenerateParentGenericDataHeaderFromGCOS(hdr, inFile);
00299         }
00300     return true;
00301 }
00302 
00303 /*
00304  * Attempts to read the GenericDataHeader from the parent Command Console file.
00305  */
00306 bool CELFileConvertToCalvin::GetParentGenericDataHeader(GenericDataHeader& hdr)
00307 {
00308         if (this->parentFileName.length() == 0)
00309                 return false;
00310         
00311         // Read DAT header
00312         DATData dat;
00313         DATFileReader reader;
00314         reader.SetFilename(this->parentFileName.c_str());
00315         try
00316         {
00317                 reader.Read(dat);
00318         }
00319         catch(affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::CalvinException&)
00320         {
00321                 return false;
00322         }
00323 
00324         // Copy GenericDataHeader
00325         hdr = *dat.GetFileHeader()->GetGenericDataHdr();
00326         return true;
00327 }
00328 
00329 /*
00330  * Generates the parent GenericDataHeader based on the GCOS CEL file.
00331  */
00332 bool CELFileConvertToCalvin::GenerateParentGenericDataHeaderFromGCOS(GenericDataHeader& hdr, CCELFileData& inFile)
00333 {
00334         ParameterNameValueType param;
00335         CCELFileHeaderData &gcosHeader = inFile.GetHeader();
00336 
00337         hdr.SetFileId("");
00338         hdr.SetFileTypeId(SCAN_ACQUISITION_DATA_TYPE);
00339         param.SetName(DAT_HEADER_PARAM_NAME);
00340         wstring datHeader;
00341     if((m_Options != NULL)&&(m_Options->m_DATFileName != NULL)) 
00342     {
00343         string dat = CELFileConversionOptions::newDatName(gcosHeader.GetDatHeader(), m_Options->m_DATFileName);
00344         if(dat == "") 
00345         {
00346             errorCode = UnableToParseDatHeader;
00347             return false;
00348         }
00349         else
00350         {
00351             datHeader = StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(dat);
00352         }
00353     }
00354     else
00355     {
00356         datHeader = StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(gcosHeader.GetDatHeader());
00357     }
00358         param.SetValueText(datHeader);
00359         hdr.AddNameValParam(param);
00360         param.SetName(ARRAY_TYPE_PARAM_NAME);
00361     if((m_Options != NULL)&&(m_Options->m_ChipType != NULL)) 
00362     {
00363             param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(m_Options->m_ChipType));
00364     }
00365     else
00366     {
00367             param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(gcosHeader.GetChipType()));
00368     }
00369         hdr.AddNameValParam(param);
00370 
00371         // Extract date from the DAT header string.
00372         wstring::size_type posColon = datHeader.find(L':');
00373         if (posColon != wstring::npos)
00374         {
00375                 // Extract pixel cols and pixel rows from the DAT header string.
00376                 int32_t rows = 0, cols = 0;
00377                 wstring colonString = datHeader.substr(posColon+1);
00378                 if (swscanf(colonString.c_str(), L"CLS=%d RWS=%d XIN=%*d YIN=%*d VE=%*d ", &rows, &cols) == 2)
00379                 {
00380                         param.SetName(ROWS_PARAM_NAME);
00381                         param.SetValueInt32(rows);
00382                         hdr.AddNameValParam(param);
00383                         param.SetName(COLS_PARAM_NAME);
00384                         param.SetValueInt32(cols);
00385                         hdr.AddNameValParam(param);
00386                 }
00387 
00388                 wstring::size_type posDate = colonString.find(L"VE=");
00389                 if (posDate != wstring::npos)
00390                 {
00391                         // Move 17 spaces to get to the start of date string from the start of VE=
00392                         // "VE=%-2d "                                                           = 6 spaces
00393                         // "TMP=%-3d" or "       "      = 7 spaces
00394                         // "%-4d" or "%%-4.1f"                  = 4 spaces
00395                         posDate += 17;
00396 
00397                         wstring dateString = colonString.substr(posDate);
00398                         // Extract scan date and time, scanner id and scanner type from the DAT header string.
00399                         u_int32_t m = 0, d = 0, y = 0, h = 0, min = 0, s = 0;
00400                         if (swscanf(dateString.c_str(), L"%d/%d/%d %d:%d:%d", &m, &d, &y, &h, &min, &s) == 6)
00401                         {
00402                                 if (y < 100)
00403                                 {
00404                                         if (y < 90)     // before affys time
00405                                                 y += 2000;
00406                                         else
00407                                                 y += 1900;
00408                                 }
00409                                 param.SetName(SCAN_DATE_PARAM_NAME);
00410                                 param.SetValueText(DateTime::FormatDateTime(y, m, d, h, min, s, false));
00411                                 hdr.AddNameValParam(param);
00412 
00413                                 wstring::size_type posEnd = dateString.find(L'\x14');
00414                                 if (posEnd != wstring::npos)
00415                                 {
00416                                         // Limit the string to be considered
00417                                         wstring scannerString = dateString.substr(0, posEnd);
00418 
00419                                         // Jump over date
00420                                         wstring::size_type posStart = scannerString.find(L" ");
00421                                         if (posStart != wstring::npos)
00422                                         {
00423                                                 scannerString = scannerString.substr(posStart+1);
00424 
00425                                                 // Jump over time
00426                                                 posStart = scannerString.find(L" ");
00427                                                 if (posStart != wstring::npos)
00428                                                 {
00429                                                         scannerString = scannerString.substr(posStart+1);
00430 
00431                                                         // The first character should be the Scanner Id; it could be an empty string though
00432                                                         if (scannerString[0] != L' ')
00433                                                         {
00434                                                                 // Find the end of the scanner ID.
00435                                                                 posStart = scannerString.find(L"  ");
00436                                                                 if (posStart != wstring::npos)
00437                                                                 {
00438                                                                         wstring scannerID = scannerString.substr(0, posStart);
00439                                                                         //wchar_t scannerID[10];
00440                                                                         //swscanf(scannerString.c_str(), L"%10S", scannerID);
00441 
00442                                                                         param.SetName(SCANNER_ID_PARAM_NAME);
00443                                                                         param.SetValueText(scannerID);
00444                                                                         hdr.AddNameValParam(param);
00445                                                                 
00446                                                                         // Jump over the scanner id
00447                                                                         scannerString = scannerString.substr(scannerID.length());
00448                                                                 }
00449                                                         }
00450 
00451                                                         // Jump over 2 spaces between the scanner id and scanner type
00452                                                         scannerString = scannerString.substr(2);
00453 
00454                                                         // The first character should be the Scanner Type; it could be an empty string though
00455                                                         if (scannerString[0] != L' ')
00456                                                         {
00457                                                                 // Find the end of the scanner type.
00458                                                                 posStart = scannerString.find(L"  ");
00459                                                                 if (posStart != wstring::npos)
00460                                                                 {
00461                                                                         wstring scannerType = scannerString.substr(0, posStart);
00462                                                                         //wchar_t scannerType[10];
00463                                                                         //swscanf(scannerString.c_str(), L"%10S", scannerType);
00464 
00465                                                                         param.SetName(SCANNER_TYPE_PARAM_NAME);
00466                                                                         param.SetValueText(scannerType);
00467                                                                         hdr.AddNameValParam(param);
00468                                                                 }
00469                                                         }
00470 
00471                                                         /// TODO: Check that this works
00472                                                         // If the param name is not scanner type then, it was not added to the hdr.
00473                                                         if (param.GetName() != SCANNER_TYPE_PARAM_NAME)
00474                                                         {
00475                                                                 wstring scannerType = GetScannerTypeFromExtraParameters();
00476                                                                 if (scannerType.length() > 0)
00477                                                                 {
00478                                                                         param.SetName(SCANNER_TYPE_PARAM_NAME);
00479                                                                         param.SetValueText(scannerType);
00480                                                                         hdr.AddNameValParam(param);
00481                                                                 }
00482                                                         }
00483                                                         /// TODO: End check
00484                                                 }
00485                                         }
00486                                 }
00487                         }
00488                 }
00489         }
00490 
00491         wstring::size_type posChipInfo = datHeader.find(L'\x14');
00492         if (posChipInfo != wstring::npos)
00493         {
00494                 // Extract arc radius, laser spot size, pixel size and image orientation from the DAT header string.
00495                 wstring chipInfoString = datHeader.substr(posChipInfo+1);
00496 
00497                 wstring arcRadiusString;
00498                 wstring laserSpotSizeString;
00499                 wstring pixelSizeString;
00500                 wstring orientationString;
00501                 for (int32_t i = 0; i <=10; ++i)
00502                 {
00503                         wstring::size_type nextPos = chipInfoString.find(L'\x14');
00504 
00505                         wstring itemString;
00506                         if (nextPos != wstring::npos)
00507                                 itemString = chipInfoString.substr(0, nextPos);
00508                         else
00509                                 itemString = chipInfoString;
00510 
00511                         StringUtils::STLTrimLeft(itemString);
00512                         StringUtils::STLTrimRight(itemString);
00513 
00514                         if (i == 6 && itemString.length() != 0) // filter
00515                         {
00516                                 int32_t filter = 0;
00517                                 if (swscanf(itemString.c_str(), L"%d", &filter) == 1)
00518                                 {
00519                                         param.SetName(FILTER_PARAM_NAME);
00520                                         param.SetValueInt32(filter);
00521                                         hdr.AddNameValParam(param);
00522                                 }
00523                         }
00524                         else if (i == 7 && itemString.length() != 0)    // arc radius
00525                         {
00526                                 float arcRadius = 0.f;
00527                                 if (swscanf(itemString.c_str(), L"%f", &arcRadius) == 1)
00528                                 {
00529                                         if (arcRadius != 0.f)
00530                                         {
00531                                                 param.SetName(ARCRADIUS_PARAM_NAME);
00532                                                 param.SetValueFloat(arcRadius);
00533                                                 hdr.AddNameValParam(param);
00534                                         }
00535                                 }
00536                         }
00537                         else if (i == 8 && itemString.length() != 0)    // laser spot size
00538                         {
00539                                 float spotSize = 0.f;
00540                                 if (swscanf(itemString.c_str(), L"%f", &spotSize) == 1)
00541                                 {
00542                                         if (spotSize != 0.f)
00543                                         {
00544                                                 param.SetName(LASER_SPOTSIZE_PARAM_NAME);
00545                                                 param.SetValueFloat(spotSize);
00546                                                 hdr.AddNameValParam(param);
00547                                         }
00548                                 }
00549                         }
00550                         else if (i == 9 && itemString.length() != 0)    // pixel size
00551                         {
00552                                 float pixelSize = 0.f;
00553                                 if (swscanf(itemString.c_str(), L"%f", &pixelSize) == 1)
00554                                 {
00555                                         if (pixelSize != 0.f)
00556                                         {
00557                                                 param.SetName(PIXEL_SIZE_PARAM_NAME);
00558                                                 param.SetValueFloat(pixelSize);
00559                                                 hdr.AddNameValParam(param);
00560                                         }
00561                                 }
00562                         }
00563                         else if (i == 10 && itemString.length() != 0)   // orientation
00564                         {
00565                                 u_int32_t orientation = 0;
00566                                 if (swscanf(itemString.c_str(), L"%d", &orientation) == 1)
00567                                 {
00568                                         param.SetName(ORIENTATION_PARAM_NAME);
00569                                         param.SetValueUInt8((u_int8_t)orientation);
00570                                         hdr.AddNameValParam(param);
00571                                 }
00572                         }
00573 
00574                         if (nextPos != wstring::npos)
00575                                 chipInfoString = chipInfoString.substr(nextPos+1);
00576                 }
00577         }
00578 
00579         if (arrayID.empty() == false || arrayBarcode.empty() == false)
00580                 // Add ArraySet GenericDataHeader
00581                 ConverterCreateAndAddParentArrayGenericDataHeader(hdr, arrayID, arrayBarcode);
00582 
00583     return true;
00584 }
00585 
00586 /*
00587  * Adds any extra parameters from the extraParameter collection to the file header.
00588  */
00589 void CELFileConvertToCalvin::AddExtraParameters(CelFileData& data)
00590 {
00591         if (this->extraParameters == NULL)
00592                 return;
00593 
00594         GenericDataHeader* gdh = data.GetFileHeader()->GetGenericDataHdr();
00595 
00596         // Copy the parameters to the file.
00597         for (ParameterNameValueTypeVector::const_iterator ii = extraParameters->begin(); ii != extraParameters->end(); ++ii)
00598         {
00599                 if (ii->GetName() == SCANNER_TYPE_PARAM_NAME)
00600                 {
00601                         continue;
00602                 }
00603 
00604                 gdh->AddNameValParam(*ii);
00605         }
00606 }
00607 
00608 /*
00609  * TODO Check that this works.
00610  */
00611 std::wstring CELFileConvertToCalvin::GetScannerTypeFromExtraParameters()
00612 {
00613         if (this->extraParameters == NULL)
00614                 return L"";
00615 
00616         for (ParameterNameValueTypeVector::const_iterator ii = extraParameters->begin(); ii != extraParameters->end(); ++ii)
00617         {
00618                 if (ii->GetName() == SCANNER_TYPE_PARAM_NAME)
00619                 {
00620                         return ii->GetValueText();
00621                 }
00622         }
00623         return L"";
00624 }
